_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three things you should develop to g: The element of renunciation to give up the element of sensuality
The element of good will to give up the element of malice
The element of harmlessness to give up the element of cruelty
